metadata.synopsis: This is lia's main dialogue in moonrise towers. She's been taken captive (along with her brother cal) - she doesn't know if her other brother rolan is alive or dead. Lia is brave and used to being in tough situations, but she's terrified for herself anf her brother (and trying to mask it with anger). Her main dialogue occurs with her in a cell and speaking to the player on the other side of the bars. There are additional branches for when she's in one cell and the player was arrested an in the cell next to her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Teleport to act 2 using the debug book, in act 2 setup choose the tiefling path. Then teleport to the moonrise dungeon - the tieflings will be there.

1.speaker: Lia
1.text: I swear, the moment these ropes are off they're going around your neck.
1.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - was interrupted while she was doing something

8.speaker: Lia
8.text: Don't worry, we'll get out of here - one way or another. We have to.
8.context: NodeContext: determined to live, almost talking to herself

13.speaker: Lia
13.text: You! You're from the grove. Are you all right?
13.context: NodeContext: she recognises the player - concerned

91.speaker: Player
91.context: NodeContext: trying to be cavalier but actually terrified for herself and her brother

85.speaker: Lia
85.text: No kidding. What are you even doing here?
85.context: NodeContext: trying to be cavalier but actually terrified for herself and her brother

98.speaker: Player
98.text: The gnomes have a plan. We're getting out of here.
98.context: NodeContext: half joke half 'you're kind of an idiot'

62.speaker: Lia
62.text: I take it getting locked up wasn't part of it?
62.context: NodeContext: half joke half 'you're kind of an idiot'

97.speaker: Lia
97.text: Look, I've no bright ideas, but whatever the gnomes have cooked up? We're in. Don't leave us in here.
97.context: NodeContext: determined to get out - won't let herself or her brother die in here

49.speaker: Player
49.text: Well, I was planning on rescuing you...
49.context: NodeContext: said with a smile, trying to rassure player

26.speaker: Lia
26.context: NodeContext: said with a smile, trying to rassure player

100.speaker: Cal
100.text: Have a little faith, Lia. If anyone can get us out, they can.
100.context: NodeContext: speaking about player, confident that the player will help

39.speaker: Cal
39.text: No, this is perfect! You're by the gnomes. They've been whispering like mad for days - they're up to something.
39.context: NodeContext: excited - most hope they've had for days

61.speaker: Player
61.text: That depends. How badly do you want to get out of here?

35.speaker: Lia
35.text: You're in a cell next to me, mate. Not exactly in a position to negotiate, are you?

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Lulling them into a false sense of security - this cell can't hold me.

77.speaker: Lia
77.text: You manage to pick these locks, and I owe you a pint.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Don't mind me, what about you?
56.context: NodeContext: trying to be cavalier but actually terrified for herself and her brother

66.speaker: Lia
66.text: Fit to murder half this damn tower. What are you even doing here?
66.context: NodeContext: trying to be cavalier but actually terrified for herself and her brother

30.speaker: Player
30.text: How did you two end up in here?

20.speaker: Lia
20.context: NodeContext: disgust at the mention of the warden. High tension situation (in prison)

11.speaker: Player
11.context: NodeContext: disgust at the mention of the warden. High tension situation (in prison)

63.speaker: Lia
63.text: Check the Warden's office, in the centre of the prison. Miss High-and-Mighty keeps the good stuff close.
63.context: NodeContext: disgust at the mention of the warden. High tension situation (in prison)

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Yes, I've got tools for them.
52.context: NodeContext: high tension situation - determined to live

25.speaker: Lia
25.text: Then get a move on - we'll be ready to run.
25.context: NodeContext: high tension situation - determined to live

84.speaker: Player
84.context: NodeContext: scared but trying not to be

59.speaker: Lia
59.text: Well hurry - who knows when that nutcase of a necromancer will come for us.
59.context: NodeContext: scared but trying not to be

104.speaker: Player
104.context: NodeContext: scared but trying not to be

87.speaker: Lia
87.text: Oh for - you try staying calm with a pack of nutcases circling you. Hurry - please.
87.context: NodeContext: scared but trying not to be

40.speaker: Lia
40.text: Argh! I almost had it - bugger off, will you?

47.speaker: Lia
47.text: Let me guess - 'The Absolute is the only way.'? Don't bother.
47.context: NodeContext: disgust - assumes player is a traitor

12.speaker: Lia
12.text: Why don't you and Zevlor take a long walk off a short cliff?
12.context: NodeContext: disgust - assumes player is a traitor

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Listen - your brother Rolan is alive. He's in Last Light Inn.
27.context: NodeContext: her brother is alive - she's shocked and relieved

15.speaker: Lia
15.text: He made it? He's all right?
15.context: NodeContext: her brother is alive - she's shocked and relieved

3.speaker: Cal
3.text: Told you. He's too stubborn to die.
3.context: NodeContext: with a smile of relief

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Listen - the others are alive. They're in the Last Light Inn.
29.context: NodeContext: she'd never admit it but she was terrfied for rolan - sigh of relief as she trails off

7.speaker: Lia
7.context: NodeContext: she'd never admit it but she was terrfied for rolan - sigh of relief as she trails off

5.speaker: Cal
5.text: Heh. Told you he'd make it.
5.context: NodeContext: relieved and delighted - always a champion of rolan

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I have some bad news - your brother, Rolan, is dead.
95.context: NodeContext: just learned her brother is dead, closing eyes in horror and grief

80.speaker: Lia
80.text: I knew it. I just... knew.
80.context: NodeContext: just learned her brother is dead, closing eyes in horror and grief

71.speaker: Cal
71.context: NodeContext: just learned his brother is dead - shell shocked

73.speaker: Lia
73.text: We can grieve later - once we get out of this pit.
73.context: NodeContext: gritted teetth, holding back her grief and keeping it together

74.speaker: Lia
74.text: So, other than to break my damn heart in two - why are you here?
74.context: NodeContext: back to business, being practical and to the point

46.speaker: Player
46.text: How did you end up in here?
46.context: NodeContext: horror and grief as he recounts what happened

119.speaker: Cal
119.text: Cultists ambushed us in the darkness and Zevlor - well, he surrendered. The others got away, but we...
119.context: NodeContext: horror and grief as he recounts what happened

18.speaker: Lia
18.text: Ended up here while Zev has all but vanished. Bet he was with the pricks from the start.

34.speaker: Cal
34.text: We don't know that for sure.
34.context: NodeContext: trying to not to jump to conclusions but he also doubts zevlor

101.speaker: Cal
101.text: Cultists ambushed us in the darkness - lined us up one by one...
101.context: NodeContext: horror and grief as he recounts what happened

83.speaker: Lia
83.text: And started gutting us one at a time. We fought back while the others ran - lot of good it did them.

16.speaker: Cal
16.text: We did what we could, Lia.
16.context: NodeContext: trying to comfort his sister

108.speaker: Player
108.text: I'm not with the cultists - I swear it.
108.context: NodeContext: surprise as her suspicion of the player lessens - mostly confused at why player is here

32.speaker: Lia
32.text: If you're not at the Absolute's beck and call, why are you here?
32.context: NodeContext: surprise as her suspicion of the player lessens - mostly confused at why player is here

79.speaker: Lia
79.text: If you're not at the Absolute's beck and call, why are you here?
79.context: NodeContext: surprise as her suspicion of the player lessens - mostly confused at why player is here

17.speaker: Player
17.text: The gnomes have a plan. I'm going to get you out of here.

6.speaker: Lia
6.text: Oh, you clever bastard. I could kiss you!

22.speaker: Cal
22.text: Not in front of me, please. I've suffered enough.
22.context: NodeContext: slight smile as he jokes

41.speaker: Lia
41.text: Whatever you lot are up to - hurry. And thank you.
41.context: NodeContext: determined - she's gonna get out of here. relieved that player is on their side

28.speaker: Player
28.text: To help. What can I do?
28.context: NodeContext: furtive, like it's a secret.

54.speaker: Cal
54.text: Gnomes next door are up to something. They've been whispering like mad.
54.context: NodeContext: furtive, like it's a secret.

51.speaker: Lia
51.text: Whatever it is, we're in. Don't leave us in here.
51.context: NodeContext: determined - she's gonna get out of here - praying the player will get her and her brother out

92.speaker: Player
92.text: That depends. Being a hero is a costly business, you know.

48.speaker: Lia
48.text: Well it clearly doesn't take much brains because, as you can see, we left our mountains of gold at home.

53.speaker: Lia
53.text: Escape first - then we'll talk payment.
53.context: NodeContext: slightly pleading in her voice behind the gruff

122.speaker: Player
122.text: I have some things to take care of.
122.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it with anger

36.speaker: Lia
36.text: Like what? Listen, we need to get out of here - Zev has killed us. These people are nuts.
36.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it with anger

60.speaker: Lia
60.text: Like what? Listen, we need to get out of here - these people are nuts.
60.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it with anger

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Get ready. We're going to fight our way out.
105.context: NodeContext: she's terrified for her brother but hiding it with determination and a touch of anger

14.speaker: Lia
14.text: Not a chance. We'll be butchered.
14.context: NodeContext: she's terrified for her brother but hiding it with determination and a touch of anger

38.speaker: Cal
38.text: If it comes to a fight, we can handle it - we always do.
38.context: NodeContext: trying to reassure his sister, know she's just worried for him

10.speaker: Lia
10.text: Look, if needs be we'll do it, but only as a last resort.
10.context: NodeContext: with a sigh, but she doesn't want to fight unless she must

43.speaker: Lia
43.text: I can't lose anyone else - I won't.
43.context: NodeContext: she's terrified for her brother but hiding it with determination and a touch of anger

4.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

103.speaker: Lia
103.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

114.speaker: Player
114.text: Say I'm with the Absolute again, and I'll leave you here to die.
114.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

120.text: Like you lot care what happens to us.
120.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

42.speaker: Lia
42.text: Like you lot care what happens to us.
42.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

118.speaker: Lia
118.text: I hope every single one of you drown in your own shit.
118.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

110.speaker: Lia
110.text: Why are you even here? Go run and play with Zev, yeah?

86.speaker: Lia
86.text: Why are you even here? Go run and play with the Absolute, yeah?

33.speaker: Lia
33.text: Why don't you take a long walk off a short cliff?

65.speaker: Lia
65.text: Shh. The guards will blow a gasket. Talk to the gnomes - they're up to something.
65.context: NodeContext: furtive - very aware guards are watching

67.speaker: Lia
67.text: Could this be taking any longer? We haven't got all damn day!
67.context: NodeContext: yelling a little, impatient to leave (she's scared)

76.speaker: Lia
76.text: Gods, the gnomes. Speak to the gnomes.
76.context: NodeContext: furtive and a bit annoyed at player for risking their lives by speaking to them with guards watching

90.speaker: Lia
90.text: You want to help? The gnomes, couple cells down, are up to something. And we're in.
90.context: NodeContext: furtive - wants to get out of here as soon as possible

82.speaker: Player
82.text: I've already spoken to them - we have a plan.
82.context: NodeContext: furtive and a bit annoyed at player for risking their lives by speaking to them with guards watching

69.speaker: Player
69.context: NodeContext: furtive and a bit annoyed at player for risking their lives by speaking to them with guards watching

75.speaker: Lia
75.text: I can't read bloody minds. Go on - before someone sees.
75.context: NodeContext: furtive and a bit annoyed at player for risking their lives by speaking to them with guards watching

58.speaker: Player
58.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

112.speaker: Player
112.text: You're not getting any help from me - enjoy your cell.
112.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

55.speaker: Lia
55.text: Bastard. Enjoy tonguing Ketheric you treacherous shit.
55.context: NodeContext: she's never hated anyone as much as she hates the player - utter fury

94.speaker: Lia
94.text: Please! Something's happening. Get us out of here!
94.context: NodeContext: terrified but also angry and determined to get out

96.speaker: Lia
96.text: Don't leave us here, damn it!
96.context: NodeContext: terrified but also angry and determined to get out

111.speaker: Lia
111.text: Go on. I think Absolute's boots need another licking.

116.speaker: Lia
116.text: Get us out of here. Please. Before that headcase of a necromancer comes back.

123.speaker: Lia
123.text: We're good to go. Now get those bloody gnomes moving.
123.context: NodeContext: high tension situation - determined to live

124.speaker: Lia
124.text: I swear, my grandmother could untie that boat faster.
124.context: NodeContext: tense and impatient to leave (she's scared)
